5. Free Public Library - Board of Trustees

Free Public Library - Board of Trustees
=======================================

Meeting Dates
-------------

The regular meetings of the Board of Trustees of the Free Public Library of Woodbridge, New Jersey for the fiscal year 2024-2025 shall be held on the fourth Thursday of each month ( except for the months August and December when there shall be no meetings) at 6:30 pm prevailing time at the Woodbridge Main Library (in the Book Examination Room on the upper level) at George Frederick Plaza, Woodbridge, New Jersey

* July 24, 2025
* September 25, 2025
* October 23, 2025
* December 4, 2025
* January 22, 2026
* February 26, 2026
* March 26, 2026
* April 23, 2026
* May 28, 2026
* June 25, 2026

Members
-------

| Name | Appointed | Expiration |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Anthony Terebetsky (Treasurer) | January 3, 2013 | December 31, 2026 |
| Sabriena Tarboush | August 22, 2023 | August 21, 2028 |
| Frederick W. Silbon, Jr. (Vice President) | January 5, 1995 | December 31, 2028 |
| Taylor DeLeo (Superintendent Of Schools, Alternate) | January 4, 2020 | Indefinite |
| Isha Vyas (President) | January 1, 2001 | December 31, 2029 |
| Ann Dinicola | January 1, 2025 | December 31, 2029 |
| Fr. William Smith (Mayor's Alternate) | April 20, 2020 | Indefinite |
| Gail Morrone (Sewaren Library Liaison) | | Indefinite |
| Qiana Davis |
| August 31, 2021 | December 31, 2029 |
| Sheilisa McNeal | January 1, 2026 | December 31, 2030 |

Description
-----------

  
The Board of Trustees of the Free Public Library was created under rules established by NJSA 40:54-9. There are 7 appointed members plus the Mayor and the Superintendent of Schools (or their alternates). The appointed Trustees serve terms of 5 years.  
The law gives the Board the authority to hire staff, make authorized purchases of library books and other materials, set policies for the use of the library and "… generally do all things necessary and proper for the establishment and maintenance of the free public library in the municipality."
